title: Multimodal Reasoning

definitions.MMICL: MMICL: Empowering Vision-language Model with Multi-Modal In-Context Learning

formulas: e= wees se se es es Ss Ss Sw Ss SP Ss SP SS SS eS SS
summary: The slide discusses Multimodal Reasoning, focusing on text-to-image reference. It presents an example problem where the task is to identify differences and similarities between two images. The images are of a sporty car and a jeep in different terrains. The slide also includes a dialogue box with questions and answers about the presence of a horse in the images.
